name: Demons 101
description:
Demons 101

Team Members: Nicolas Guevara, Jocque Jefferson, Daniel Olaes

A survival horror game where you play as Gary, a student at College University, who is studying late in his university study room. 

However, after an Occult major accidentally leaves the Necronomicon open causing demon phantoms from Hell escape into our realm, ripping the pages from the Necronomicon and hiding them throughout the school. 

Gary, now trapped in the demon-infested university, is visited and guided by a heavenly being, Virgil, who gives him a holy lantern to help him survive. Using the heavenly lantern, Gary is able to shine bright the darkness around him, illuminating the area around him for a short time. With his holy lantern and Virgil's guidance, Gary must outmaneuver the demon, collect the missing Necronomicon pages, and banish the demons back to Hell before it's too late.

Can you survive and collect all the missing Necronomicon pages?

Controls:

MOVE Gary using the ARROW KEYS.

Use the lantern to SHINE through the darkness using SPACE.

SPRINT away from danger using the SHIFT.
